shortdesc: An interactive sales dashboard for Formula 1 teams that visualizes car ad space, highlights coverage gaps, and helps manage bidding conflicts — enabling faster, smarter selling and sponsorship decisions at a glance.
desc: About this project: this was an interactive sales dashboard for Formula 1 teams that visualizes car ad space, highlights coverage gaps, and helps manage bidding conflicts — enabling faster, smarter selling and sponsorship decisions at a glance.
title: RaceSpace Platform MVP Concept
